files.title: Add data
files.description:
Upload your training and testing data here. 
 Please use 44.1kHz WAV format audio, and .eaf Elan transcription files. 
 Audio files and transcription files must have matching filenames.
files.settingsDescription: What is the name of the Elan tier that your transcriptions are on?

fileUpload.dropFilesHint: Click to select and upload files, or drop your files here

prepare.title: Data preparation
prepare.bannerMessage: Text has been cleaned and normalised OK

l2s.title: Upload Letter to Sound rules
l2s.description:
The letter to sound file is used to build a pronunciation dictionary for the corpus. Make one by listing one column of all the characters in your corpus. Make a second column (separated by a space) of a symbol representing how that characted is pronounced. You can use IPA, or SAMPA for the pronunciation symbols.  

 For example: 
 n n 
 ng Å‹ 
 r r 
 y j
l2s.dropFilesHint: Click here to upload your l2s file, or drop one here

lexicon.title: Review the lexicon
lexicon.description: The pronunciation lexicon is generated from the wordlist and letter-to-sound rules you uploaded. Check it before training.

settings.title: Model settings
settings.description: These settings are used when training the model.
settings.ngramDescription: n-gram value of 1 will set the system to learn single words. To make the system learn from words and their context (neighbouring words), set the n-gram to 2 or 3.

results.title: Trained Model Results
results.description: List of models that have been run here.
results.downloadButton: Download a bundle of the model, settings and information about training data
results.downloadModalHeader: Your files and settings are being compiled
results.downloadModalContent: Click Save on your browser's download dialog
results.newTranscribeButton: Use the model to transcribe new audio

error.title: Error occured while training the model

new.title: Transcribe some audio
new.dropFilesHint: Click here to choose an audio file, or drop an audio file here
